attributes.action: Stop 'Islamophobia' being written into law and classed as Racism.
attributes.background: Islam is not a race. It is a religion. Criticising religion is a fundamental freedom of society. The right to freedom of thought and the right to freedom of opinion and expression. No religion should be free from criticism.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure whether you would like the existing law changed or no new laws introduced.

You will also need to give your full name to start a petition.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like to see happen.
